level.text: Any employer who fails to pay the wages required by this Chapter shall pay to the Office of Wage-Hour, Department of Employment Services, an amount equal to the unpaid wages, which amount shall be distributed by the Office of Wage-Hour to employees due said unpaid wages.

Unpaid wages which cannot be paid due to the inability to locate employees or refusal of employees to accept said unpaid wages shall escheat to the District of Columbia Government in accordance with D.C. Code, Sections 42-201-242.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 187 (January 14, 1994).
